version_description: Minor bug fix
Minor bug fix

* New! and improved calendar look and feel
* New! temporary invitations allowing access to expire after 24 or 48 hours
* Language support now includes: English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, German, Italian, Dutch, Turkish
* Improved system responsiveness
* Squashed many bugs!
* Several security improvements
- Ability to send invitations is now password protected
- Invitations are now single use, so they can’t be forwarded and reused without owner knowledge
- Critical controller settings are now password protected when accessed via the mobile app
- All password fields now include 20 minute lock out after 5 failed attempts
* Improved messaging throughout
* WiFi strength indicator now includes raw Received Signal Strength Indicator (RSSI) value for easier troubleshooting WiFi range challenges
* Updated End User License Agreement (EULA)
* Updated How To Guide
* App is now universal to run full screen on iPads

* New! and improved calendar look and feel
* New! temporary invitations allowing access to expire after 24 or 48 hours
* Language support now includes: English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, German, Italian, Dutch, Turkish
* Improved system responsiveness
* Squashed many bugs!
* Several security improvements
- Ability to send invitations is now password protected
- Invitations are now single use, so they can’t be forwarded and reused without owner knowledge
- Critical controller settings are now password protected when accessed via the mobile app
- All password fields now include 20 minute lock out after 5 failed attempts
* Improved messaging throughout
* WiFi strength indicator now includes raw Received Signal Strength Indicator (RSSI) value for easier troubleshooting WiFi range challenges
* Updated End User License Agreement (EULA)
* Updated How To Guide
* App is now universal to run full screen on iPads

* Added Bulgarian, Polish, Czech
* Added weather support for the following countries: Austria, Bulgaria, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Ecuador, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Guatemala, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Nicaragua, Paraguay, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Uruguay, Venezuela
* Minor bug fixes

* Added Bulgarian, Polish, Czech
* Added weather support for the following countries: Austria, Bulgaria, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Ecuador, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Guatemala, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Nicaragua, Paraguay, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Uruguay, Venezuela
* Minor bug fixes

* Introducing Amazon Alexa enabled voice commands for Rain Bird WiFi controllers.
* "Ask Rain Bird" via the Alexa voice assistant to run a program or water a zone using your own custom names, initiate a watering delay, report on irrigation time remaining, identify if a rain sensor has tripped, and much more.
* For more information visit wifi-pro.rainbird.com/Alexa

* Added weather support for Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Iraq, Lebanon, Pakistan, Tunisia, India, Switzerland, Norway
* Minor bug fixes

* Added support for the TBOS-BT controller
* Minor bug fixes
* Minor bug fixes
* Minor bug fixes

* Added weather support for China, Egypt, Hong Kong, Israel, Morocco, Oman, Russia, Singapore, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, UAE, Ukraine
* Minor bug fixes
* Minor bug fix

* Added ESP-ME3 controller with flow sensor setup
* Minor bug fixes
* Minor bug fix
* Minor bug fixes

* Integration with Google Home and the Google Assistant is here!
* Tweaks for compatibility with iOS 13
* UI tweaks for select Rain Bird controllers
* Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements
* Miscellaneous bug fixes
* Minor bug fixes

* Added water use statistics for ESP-ME3
* Added Water Management setting (Gallons, Liters, Cubic Meters) to App Settings
* Added support for iOS 13 dark mode
* Enabled Connected Home section of Controller Settings for India, Australia, United Kingdom

* Redesigned manual watering screen for select Rain Bird controllers
